name: Out of Shock
description:
"OUT OF SHOCK" IS A SUBMISSION FOR THE GMTK 2020

----------------------------------------

- DEBUGGED VERSION -
https://bilzeiboube.itch.io/sorry-it-was-bugged
(You can still play the submission if you want to vote properly. The actual version don't start the story fights properly, but you can experience them with the endless mode.)

----------------------------------------

You play as Waver, A robot who just awoke from a long sleep... And you seek your creator ! Your only issue is... You can't move properly. Your movment keys will change during each fight, try to adapt yourself !

Inclusive gameplay : Use Arrow keys ! They won't change, letting you experience the game more freely :)

The game features the classic story mode, but as bonus, you have 3 endless modes to challenge yourself !

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Also, this is the second full game of the UNISQUID SQUAD !

https://faer.itch.io/sentinels (the first one)


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
